column6:
"DECALOGUE",2005,5
A new costumed foe takes to the streets of Hell's Kitchen. Who is he and what will his effect on Daredevil's new status quo be? Did someone say "new super-villian?" Oh, yes. From the writer of New Avengers, it's the very, very dark side of the Marvel Universe. Part 3 (of 6).
Retailer Alert: This bold, new look will showcase the monthly Daredevil title for the length of the "Decalogue" storyarc.
32 PGS./MARVEL PSR ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Dave Stewart
